Subskills.name: Leap Force
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by freezing leap.

Subskills.name: Extended Field
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum range of freezing leap.

Subskills.name: Superhero Landing
Subskills.description: Unleash an arc of shockwaves towards target location when landing.

Subskills.name: Dazing Impact
Subskills.description: Chance to stun targets on hit.

Subskills.name: Grand Impact
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of freezing leap.

Subskills.name: Concentrated Detonation
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt of freezing leap decreasing its area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Echoing Frostquake
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an additional shockwave when landing.

Subskills.name: Hare Spirit
Subskills.description: Increases landing recovery when using freezing leap.

Subskills.name: Frostbending Leap
Subskills.description: Pull nearby monsters towards you when landing with increased area of effect radius inflicting elemental break.

Subskills.name: Artic Vulnerability
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict cold break on hit.

Subskills.name: Overwhelming Impacts
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Frosted Territory
Subskills.description: Ground below landing location is left frosted dealing damage over time and slowing monsters.

Subskills.name: Seismic Icequake
Subskills.description: Leave the ground trembling after landing causing additional echos.

Subskills.name: Tectonic Stampede
Subskills.description: Charge towards target location followed by a shockwave of ice.
